title: [Ta'Illistim, Mzaarine Bazaar]
description: Situated at a desirable corner of the bazaar, a rather tall grey-blue granite building rises above its neighboring shops.  Its glaesine windows are illuminated from within, while silvery moonlight plays off the bas-reliefs etched into the granite walls, depicting merchants in the act of trading.

Situated at a desirable corner of the bazaar, a rather tall grey-blue granite building rises above its neighboring shops.  Its glaesine windows glimmer in the sunshine, while the reflected light plays off the bas-reliefs etched into the granite walls, depicting merchants in the act of trading.
